amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to strike funding for Overseas Humanitarian, Disaster, and Civic Aid program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for the Overseas Humanitarian, Disaster, and Civic Aid program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 370 (Roll no. 256).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 370 (Roll no. 256).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
